channel.title: HELP *please just help me*
channel.description:
Please help me I just can't figure this out!
When my server says connected to 0.0.0.0:43594 should it say my "no-ip.biz:43594" instead of the 0.0.0.0?
I have changed my Client ip to my "no-ip.biz" but it says "error connecting to server"
Also when I want to make my client downloadable so people can play how do I do that without them editing the client/server is there any tutorials on how to do this FFS?
They just expect you to know how an put your client DL on the Mopar Status list. I'm so lost I need help I'm begging anyone to help me. I just want to get my server online and it has been taking days.
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE don't direct me to the "How to make a server" tutorials because they don't teach you how to make your client download and what not.
I just don't know how to get my server online and I've portforwarded and got a no-ip! :(

item.title: HELP *please just help me*
item.dc:creator: @DAGSEE DAGSEE
item.description:
@DAGSEE wrote:

you need help? ill help.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP *please just help me*
item.dc:creator: @GnarlyUnicorn GnarlyUnicorn
item.description:
@GnarlyUnicorn wrote:

I know that lol.

I was just putting “no-ip.biz” because I wasn’t saying my server name I thought people would just know what I meant.

Any reason why its saying error connecting to server?

Read full topic

item.title: HELP *please just help me*
item.dc:creator: @mrx_dodian mrx dodian
item.description:
@mrx_dodian wrote:

Ok lol your probly this is probly your first server because you dont add no-ip.biz you add servername.no-ip.biz

once you have done that compile it and if you have winrar/zip rght click your client folder and click add “CLIENTSNAME.rar/zip” then upload it to www.uppit.com/mediafire.com or many others

Read full topic
